properties.title: Bikepark at the lake
properties.abstract: Three generations â€“ children, youth and adults get the possibilities to play and have fun on the Bikepark am See. There are many possibilities to improve skills and feel more save on the bike.
properties.description:
Bikepark am See is located in Walenstadt - surrounded by the mountains Churfirsten and only 500 m away from the lake Walensee. This allows a refreshment after the activities.
Different possibilities and combinations enable endless fun. Additional to the pumptrack there is also a jump line and a skill center. 

The area of the park is 80 x 30 m and include also a grill-chillplace.
properties.name: Bicycle Club Walenstadt
